examples: Multiple hypotheses blocked by missing infrastructure
recurringFriction.addressedBy: Updated trade-research.md with execution bias and activation checklist

rootCausesIdentified: API response format varies (clobTokenIds as JSON string vs array)
Polymarket pages may require specific URL patterns
No clear workflow for promoting hypotheses to testing status

findings: 6 agents missing post-session reflection template - added to all
trade-research lacked execution bias - added activation checklist and execution-first mindset
market-watcher lacked API fallback guidance - added
lastAgentReview.notes: First agent-review execution. All agent prompts now consistent with reflection protocol. Trade research should show improved hypothesis activation velocity.

lastBuildSprint.notes: Implemented pipeline scheduler reliability fix. Added RECURRING_PIPELINES config and ensurePipelinesScheduled() to daemon.ts. Daemon now verifies on every tick that all 7 recurring pipelines have pending tasks, auto-scheduling any that are missing. Also added price-tracker to the recurring pipeline list. This fixes the issue where pipelines could silently stop running if rescheduling failed.
